website_summaries.verdict: Trusted brand provides three hours of battery life, clear instructions, and high success rate.
pros: Smart sensors automatically determine the right amount of shock to deliver
Ideal for home and also in the car, where it can be used at a moment's notice
Includes a training mode with eight emergency scenarios
cons: Some users have had problems with the battery

customer_reviews.title: IT SAVED MY WIFES LIFE!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My wife has an autoimmune liver disease and is on the liver transplant list. I bought this as a "just in case" because I wanted to cover all bases as her health declines. Little didn't I know that I would end up using it. It worked, and without it I would have been writing her obituary instead of this review. So my advice, stop wasting money on crap you don't need and buy something like this that you do need. It may just save yours, or someone you loves life.
customer_reviews.author: Super Mike

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for peace of mind
customer_reviews.text: I bought this April 2012. Never had to use it but so far has functioned as advertised. The battery finally gave up on me as of the date of this review (5 years and 4 months). Though the battery life is expected for 4 years. And it does seem prudent to me now that a second backup battery would be a smart investment on such a safety device as this. One note about buying replacement batteries.....customer reviews on replacement batteries from different sellers seem to be all over the place. I recommend going straight to Phillips and buying their OEM battery directly from Phillips.
customer_reviews.author: RichardTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Firefighter and Medic recommended
customer_reviews.text: Phenomenal and high quality product. I am a firefighter/medic. We carry Philips brand professional defibrillator and it is almost identical to this one. Very durable case, easy pad removal........ A 6 year old could listen to the step by step instructions without flaw after receiving a short lesson. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: ElizabethTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I got this product for my emergency grab bag that I am now bringing to camp with me when I am a camp nurse. Last year we had a worker code and we had to wait over 10 minutes for first responders to bring theirs. I hope I never have to use this but I am now prepared and would rather have it and never need it then need it and never have it. Product is easy to set up and maintain and I would recommend it for the lay person who isn't use to this type of equipment. It talks you through everything you need to do!
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: The restrictions on the sale or distribution of Philips' devices pursuant to the Decree will remain in effect until Philips has satisfied the Food and Drug Administration that its facilities
customer_reviews.text: The product contained the following letter. This letter should be on the product page. Perhaps this product should not even be sold. "This product is distributed pursuant to an exception to the Consent Decree of Permanent Injunction, filed in United States v. Philips North America LLC, et al., Civ. Action No. 17-cv-11955 (D. Mass. 2017). The restrictions on the sale or distribution of Philips' devices pursuant to the Decree will remain in effect until Philips has satisfied the Food and Drug Administration that its facilities, methods, processes, and controls related to the manufacture and quality of the product are in conformity with the Quality System Regulation, 21 C.F.R. Part 820 and the terms of the Consent Decree."
customer_reviews.author: Abhishek Anand

customer_reviews.title: they send a recall .  they know one we bought.  is it recalled or not?
customer_reviews.text: we hope to never need to use this product.now we don't know if it will work. if its recalled tell me what to do . not a bunch of pages trying to sell batteries. not happy.
customer_reviews.author: SLE

customer_reviews.title: Battery already died
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this one year ago and the battery is already dead. Says it should last 4 years. Will reorder another and hope it lasts the 4 years as Phillips states.
customer_reviews.author: kcr

customer_reviews.title: Machine won’t quit beeping loudly
customer_reviews.text: This machine started beeping a few months ago it has never been used so I ordered a replacement battery now it is beeping again...So much money and I cannot use it
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Weaver

customer_reviews.title: Be Prepared for your Family, Friends and Guests.
customer_reviews.text: Chance favors the prepared mind. I am glad I have it but hope to ever used it. If you have young children and grandparents around often, I think it is prudent to have one. Be a 1st responder.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck N

customer_reviews.title: Faulty zipper pull on case
customer_reviews.text: Have not used but the first time I opened the case, the zipper pull came off, now I must use a twist tie to pull the zipper. A lot of money for a faulty case. The battery flashing from the beginning...supposed to last 5 years...did not make 60 days. Bad buy.
customer_reviews.author: K B MACHER

customer_reviews.title: Ordered Sept 2018
customer_reviews.text: Ordered Sept 2018, battery expiration date was 2024, pad expiration date 2020. Seems to be a recently manufactured unit. Thanks Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Dan B.

customer_reviews.title: Good luck registering this with Philips
customer_reviews.text: Registration card was returned and there is no link on their web page to register. Not a problem with most products, but now I don't know about recalls or important updates. Regret buying. I'd return it if I had not owned this long.
customer_reviews.author: George T. Griswold, Jr.

customer_reviews.title: No returns?
customer_reviews.text: Maybe should put not returnable on top. Product damaged and can't return. This is terrible. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Nedumparambil

customer_reviews.title: Be careful!
customer_reviews.text: Please be careful when ordering as the item is not returnable
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Since of security
customer_reviews.text: Hope I never have to use it, but I feel safe having it around
customer_reviews.author: Rdney W.

customer_reviews.title: No response from manufacturer
customer_reviews.text: The CD that came with it will not play in our cd player or computer. Have called multiple times. Can only leave a message. Never had a call back. Really pissed off after spending over $1,000.
customer_reviews.author: KDT

customer_reviews.title: Great to have in case of emergency. Always be prepared.
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping. Great packaging! Testing worked as expected. Haven’t had to used it for real, but it’s live and ready if needed. I’m only 35, but we live in the country and you never know what can happen if someone’s visiting and has a heart attack.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Instructions are easy to understand
customer_reviews.text: Instructions are easy to understand. Thank God have not had to use. If you are a senior with someone else living with you buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Looks to be a good AED for the price
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our office. And I hope I never have to use it! We have 50+ people, a variety of ages and genders. Most of us are CPR trained, but having this AED on hand brings an extra level of comfort. Very good instructional video included.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Ringsmuth

customer_reviews.title: This was purchased to maybe save a child's life.
customer_reviews.text: It's hard to review a purchase that I hope we will never have to use. Because of a medical condition affecting my 11 year old niece she has to have a AED with her at all times. We pray that it will never have to be used.
customer_reviews.author: Bob D

customer_reviews.title: Totally voice and computer instructed-great
customer_reviews.text: This device can make a huge difference. I read the instructions and there is a practice unit. It has a computer monitor that determines if electrical shock is needed reducing error. It can repeat treament immdiately and automatically if warranted. Public events and institutions require them inmany jurisdiction. Why not in your jurisdiction. The iphone or ipad can wait.
customer_reviews.author: James R Ross

customer_reviews.title: Knowing I might be able to save a life is worth investment
customer_reviews.text: Easy instructions. Hope I never have to use. Peace of mind having is worth the price as mother passed at 70 due to cardiac arrest.
customer_reviews.author: Carla Lively

customer_reviews.title: ... heart patient or potentially at risk this is a good item to have
customer_reviews.text: If a family member is a heart patient or potentially at risk this is a good item to have. They have come down quite a bit in price as I recall when they were $3,000. This is piece of mind and I know people who wish they had one too late. I am glad I bought this and hope I never use it.
customer_reviews.author: LRLCYN

customer_reviews.title: Piece of mind
customer_reviews.text: It's not a benefit if you don't have it. Simple insurance policy for loved ones. Compact and perfect for RV travels too.
customer_reviews.author: happy feet

customer_reviews.title: Hope I never need to use. Glad I have
customer_reviews.text: Mom has afib, dad has had quadrupal bypass, I am a scared daughter at home. Bought so I felt more secure Took red cross class on line. I hope i never need but glad i have
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.text: Appears that it could not be easier to use. Very simple setup. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: M. Olson

customer_reviews.title: Good insurance if you travel and have a heart condition.
customer_reviews.text: I have congestive heart failure and we camp in the state parks a lot away from quick medical response. Nice insurance to have just in case. Hope I never need to use it. Reviews on other sites are all positive. At home we fairly close to a fire station but the wife could start it, if need there too. Make sure that whoever might use it has read the instructions before hand. They are fairly clear cut but having to only review vs study them can save time in an emergency. Giot this as a lightening deal, good price.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Great investment
customer_reviews.text: My father has heart disease and I have purchased one for my parents home and our home. I pray we never have to use it but I was trained on this unit by the American Red Cross CPR class and knew I had to buy one for our families. Thank you for making it more affordable!!!
customer_reviews.author: K. Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use with excellent instructive video
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use with excellent instructive video. I like that the machine even gives instructions to coach you through CPR if needed. I haven't needed the machine yet, but just having it makes me feel more confident as my partner did suffer a heart attack in the recent past. Being in a remote area, it is nice to have this on hand!
customer_reviews.author: Satisfied customer

customer_reviews.title: This could save a life
customer_reviews.text: Compact. Easy to set up & understand use. Notifies of low battery.
customer_reviews.author: clsdoc

customer_reviews.title: The instructions are clear the voice is easy to understand- the unit is light weight and well ...
customer_reviews.text: This is something that you hope to never have to use. The instructions are clear the voice is easy to understand- the unit is light weight and well packaged.
customer_reviews.author: Dave P.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product and very happy with the unit. Will purchase again when needed. Nice work Phillips
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Delivered as expected - happy to have this for any potential emergency
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Just in Case
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for "just in case" scenarios. Being emergency professionals, I'm sure it will come in handy during our travels! Haven't had to use it yet; thank God!
customer_reviews.author: sherry Stone

customer_reviews.title: Looks good - hope it works.
customer_reviews.text: The defibrillater has completed its "set up" and "said" it is OK. Hope I never have to tell you that it works as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: chickenair

customer_reviews.title: Must have for every home
customer_reviews.text: Must've have in every home. wish i had purchased it sooner. Might of saved the life of my brother. :(
customer_reviews.author: F. Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be a very good quality product
customer_reviews.text: My insurance policy. I am not sure how you rate this product, as if you ever have to use it, a serious health problem exists. Seems to be a very good quality product. It goes everywhere with me and I have absolutely no issues with the AED. Hopefully it never gets used.
customer_reviews.author: RJMcP

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: Hope I don't have to use it But easy to set up, just pull out a piece of paper Small to carry A piece of mind
customer_reviews.author: pc

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: An excellent purchase of something we hope never to use.
customer_reviews.author: A FAN

customer_reviews.title: I never thought this would be so easy to learn to use
customer_reviews.text: I never thought this would be so easy to learn to use. Pretty much idiot proof voice prompts and instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Tab McBride

customer_reviews.title: Good educational materials
customer_reviews.text: Very straightforward set up. Good educational materials. Believe my elderly parents can handle it if necessary
customer_reviews.author: peter maki

customer_reviews.title: Great machine and you never know when you might need it!
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality and easy to use. Small and compact - a must for all households. You never know when you will need it, but it will save a life. Then you will be happy you had it. One if the best out there. My husband is a physician and wanted to buy on,y this model.
customer_reviews.author: Good customer!

customer_reviews.title: Excellent piece of equipment
customer_reviews.text: Excellent piece of equipment. Availability of training pads is especially useful. they are easy to use and work quite well.
customer_reviews.author: Harold Glass

customer_reviews.title: AED
customer_reviews.text: Great AED, I've had one for years and hopefully will never need it. It blinks all the time so I know it's charged and ready to go. Very well made.
customer_reviews.author: John H. Nickels

customer_reviews.title: Works as promised... so far
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had to use it yet, fortunately, but the unit has all the elements necessary for defibrillating the heart. It's compact and it activated itself properly after following the clear directions enclosed with the unit. Battery life and pad life are approximately four years; the AED will inform you when they are in need of replacement. The one additional item you may want to buy to add to the unit is a safety razor to remove excessive chest hair in case it's needed. According to the class I took on using the AED, excessive hair can actually catch fire from the electric shock.
customer_reviews.author: doctorbabe

customer_reviews.title: Philips Defibrillator
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to understand. The talking feature works very well. We left ours in a cold car that was below the recommended temperature. The defib. voice instructed us how to get it functional again. We are very pleased with the ease of operation.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Murchison

customer_reviews.title: Worth the cost
customer_reviews.text: Comes with a very nice protective case that is reinforced. There is a convenient window through which you can see a slowly blinking light that indicates the charge is full on the AED. Hope I won't have to use it but it gives me a great peace of mind knowing it is available if needed. Although it's expensive, I don't think I could live with myself if someone I know died and I didn't even try to save them just because of cost. After all, don't those we love have lives that are priceless? What's a little financial sacrifice in the short term for potential long term happiness?
customer_reviews.author: Shar928

customer_reviews.title: Very nice unit
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this just in case. I take it to family outings and when we visit our parents. I hope I never have to use it but am glad to own one.
customer_reviews.author: NonStopEMD

customer_reviews.title: Nice to have in case of need.
customer_reviews.text: 'hope we don't have to use it, but nice to know we can if needed
customer_reviews.author: SY

customer_reviews.title: Arrived as promised
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this ahead of having open-heart surgery done on me for replacing my aortic heart valve. I bought it for my church to have on hand should anyone need the use of it. My pastor's wife is a Registered Nurse, and so I felt it would be a good addition. My heart surgery went fine, and I hopefully will not need the use of this in the immediate future. In the meantime, it is on hand just in case....
customer_reviews.author: Scott Case

customer_reviews.title: seems like an excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Hope. never have to use it! Arrived on time, seems like an excellent product. Glad I have it.
customer_reviews.author: KarlG

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I feel more secure knowing we have this in our home.
customer_reviews.author: LBK

customer_reviews.title: Not something to write a bad review of.
customer_reviews.text: All seems good with this device so I hope I never have to write a bad review of it!
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Nickles

customer_reviews.title: fire & medical staff may be busy w/ other calls so its' better to own an AED for family use
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for the family. Last Thurs was Thanksgiving. I brought the AED machine in case anyone has a heart attack from eating too much rich food. It gave me peace of mind knowing I have the AED machine. I had the feeling during holidays, many people at risk get a cardiac arrest so I will bring the AED when we attend a party. Police, fire & medical staff may be busy w/ other calls so its' better to own an AED for family use.
customer_reviews.author: Tuquoise

customer_reviews.title: Philips HeartStart Home Defibrillator
customer_reviews.text: Hopefully will never need, but training CD that came with product and the ease of use if ever needed make it so simple, that even a person in a panic should be able to follow the voice commands and use this product.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Seidman

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. Haven't had to use it yet
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Haven't had to use it yet. That will be the true test. A five star, would be automatic, if this had an AC adaptor to keep the battery always charged.
customer_reviews.author: Laura M

customer_reviews.title: so only then will I know what it's worth but it is a pretty well packaged product and the only one that is ...
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had a chance to use it for real, so only then will I know what it's worth but it is a pretty well packaged product and the only one that is affordable for home use. -1 star for the price though because it is still very expensive for what is basically life saving insurance that you might not ever need to use.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Easley

customer_reviews.title: HeartStart Defibrillator
customer_reviews.text: Very compact with good instructions. Comes with a very durable case and handle which makes it easily portable. I hope I never have to use it!
customer_reviews.author: Judith M. Betten

customer_reviews.title: product liability for your life
customer_reviews.text: do not buy this. it comes with a legal warning in it... this is not disclosed by amazon or the seller
customer_reviews.author: RW1906

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I think this will be exactly what I wanted. hopefully I will ever have to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Bette Chase

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: cannot return item, wish that info was given before ordering
customer_reviews.author: angella j green

customer_reviews.title: Looks good
customer_reviews.text: Thankfully I have not had to use my AED but it looks like an authentic Philips product and they have an excellent reputation. Great product and great price
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: Great piece of mind! Read instructions and watch video!
customer_reviews.text: Pretty expensive but great piece of mind! I havent pulled the battery start yet because I want it to last until I need it. Docked a star because its so dang expensive! Read instructions and watch video! also good to learn cpr!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: havent used it yet and hope not but so far so good
customer_reviews.author: Oswald Hew-wing

customer_reviews.title: ... battery was all ready installed so if it’s only good for a certain amount of time how are we ...
customer_reviews.text: Directions said to install battery but the battery was all ready installed so if it’s only good for a certain amount of time how are we supposed to know how much time the battery is good for? Tried to contact Phillips and got nowhere. Very unsatisfactory customer service
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a sex toy!
customer_reviews.text: I like this product even though I have never used it. I really hope I won't use it ever. Just as a sidenote, do not attach the leads to your testicles.
customer_reviews.author: Ben B.

customer_reviews.title: I am alive!
customer_reviews.text: Actually the instructions were pretty good. This is one of those products that you will either give 5 stars or 0 stars. In fact, it won't ever get zero stars as the dead do not often come back to review products!
customer_reviews.author: Drew K. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Defibrillator Deficiency
customer_reviews.text: This model cannot be mounted and could easily walk off. If it had a mounting capability, it would be much more valuable.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! We have been experimenting with this AED and ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! We have been experimenting with this AED and love it. Me and my partner keep shocking each other over and over. So much fun and it could save a life if we really need to.
customer_reviews.author: Paid Advestisement

customer_reviews.title: Saved a life with this AED
customer_reviews.text: I carry this AED in my cruiser on patrol. Recently I was called to a male that was unresponsive at a local restaurant. I easily deployed the AED after having familiarized myself with the unit. I pressed the on button and the AED did the rest. It gave instructions and told me when to press what button. After EMS personnel arrived and transported the male to the hospital they told me that the quick deployment of the AED most likely save the mans life.
customer_reviews.author: Michael P. Stenger

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to use, very clean and simple. Brilliant product. I plan to add these to our business locations as well as the house and vehicles.Why wouldn't you want to protect loved ones, employees, friends or even a stranger in need of help.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: There is a problem with this Defibrillator. We purchased ...
customer_reviews.text: There is a problem with this Defibrillator. We purchased a new battery thinking that was the problem even though it's not past the 4 yr. guarantee. The new battery reacted the same way the unit just beeps. We were told to contact who we bought it from for service of the unit and that is you.
customer_reviews.author: LF54

customer_reviews.title: This is my second purchase of this item. I ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase of this item. I have one for my home and purchased this one for another family.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly D.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for home owners, small business owners and those that travel frequently by car.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for home owners, small business owners and those that travel frequently by car. Easy to operate, even without training (though I always recommend that you familiarize yourself with any AED/medical device you carry). Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony and Kat

customer_reviews.title: Life Or Death
customer_reviews.text: If you're reading this evaluation you already know the necessity of having a defibrillator nearby. This one is reasonably priced and will save a life someday. It is as simple to use as they get, and you could use it even if you never heard of one before. It comes in a storage box that can be accessed in mere moments, and moments might count. I was a paramedic in a big city fire department for over 30 years and I have attempted to resuscitate more people than I can remember, but almost always it was unsuccessful because too much time had elapsed since the cardiac arrest. This is cheaper than a casket.
customer_reviews.author: Cool Rod

customer_reviews.title: Peace of Mind
customer_reviews.text: Thank goodness I have never had to use this but it is easy to use and I like that it talks you through everything. This brand was highly recommended by the person who did my CPR certification. It's just peace of mind and I think I could handle it if an emergency arose.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality product. Automated so that the homeowner can easily use it. Provides detailed voice instructions as you proceed through each step of employing the device. I have wanted one for years, but could not bring myself to pay the price. But finally, I realized that saving one life would make that expense worthwhile, especially if it was a member of my own family.
customer_reviews.author: Humble Opine

customer_reviews.title: NOT RETURNABLE
customer_reviews.text: The item is not returnable - this is not stated anywhere on the amazon.com page and is a sneaky tactic by the manufacturer
customer_reviews.author: Moscuba

customer_reviews.title: Piece of mind to have at home
customer_reviews.text: I don't know about the battery life since i have only had it a few months but this is a high quality product that my company also has on hand. Has a step by step video to show you how to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Especially when a loved one has a heart condition, you need one of these around.
customer_reviews.author: Discotheque

customer_reviews.title: Hoping to never have to use
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my fifteen year old son who was diagnosed with cardiomyopathy !!! If ever need I feel very confident with the step by step instructions that the device itself walks you through !!!! Our cardiologist said anyone with a family member with heart trouble should have a home defibrillator !!! It truly gives me piece of mind and you can never put a price on that ... Well worth the investment
customer_reviews.author: roaser

customer_reviews.title: EASY SETUP
customer_reviews.text: JUST PURCHASED. THANKFULLY HAVEN'T HAD TO USE IT. INSTRUCTIONS EASY TO FOLLOW.
customer_reviews.author: Hudsonman

customer_reviews.title: Heart Start home defibrillator
customer_reviews.text: I chose to buy the defibrillator to have peace of mind. When I opened it to get started, the instructions were very easy to follow. Because I am CPR certified, I now feel confident to help someone if their heart stops, using my defibrillator.
customer_reviews.author: janice tray

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: An excellent AED with a good reputation. Haven't had to use it luckily! Good pricing at Amazon.com and good support through Philips Medical Systems (there was a problem with the lot of gel-covered pads I received with mine and Philips replaced them without question). So if you purchased yours around November 2012 and it keeps chirping at you to replace the pads, phone Philips, it may be the pads were from a bad lot.
customer_reviews.author: huehuetenango

customer_reviews.title: Set up is quick and easy and directions are clear and concise as to how ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this because both parents are getting up there in years and both have heart problems. Set up is quick and easy and directions are clear and concise as to how to use it. When I gave Mom & Dad a mini lesson on how to use it, Dad informed me: "You're not gonna use that thing on me." It's called implied consent Dad, get over it, it will be used!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen A. Warren

customer_reviews.title: The one thing I bought that I hope I never use!
customer_reviews.text: Hopefully I'll never have to see if it works or not!
customer_reviews.author: Carla Prepejchal

customer_reviews.title: Helped a lot in a family, the elder parents ...
customer_reviews.text: Helped a lot in a family, the elder parents and child . It is very convinent when you are getting in a trouble.
customer_reviews.author: aphire

customer_reviews.title: If you need one, this is a great unit
customer_reviews.text: Easy to carry with you, and designed so that even someone without training can use it by following vocal instructions when it is turned on. Long battery life.
customer_reviews.author: cchildre

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I hope I never need it, but this is a compact and reliable device.
customer_reviews.author: Simon Jacobsen

customer_reviews.title: Compact, Easy-to-Use Life-Saver
customer_reviews.text: The Philips AED is a compact, easy-to-carry unit that demands little of the user. I bought one for home use, and donated another to Planes of Fame air museum, where I work as a volunteer. The device prompts every step, has pictographs showing proper placement or technique, and performs its own diagnostics automatically. It is a simple, effective piece of equipment that can save lives.
customer_reviews.author: James V. Halloran III

customer_reviews.title: glad we have
customer_reviews.text: hope we never have to use it. glad we have it
customer_reviews.author: ZM

customer_reviews.title: Great Peace of Mind and Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy to have this! It is extremely easy-to-use and even tells you how to do CPR along with giving a rhythm to follow. Instructions given by voice and after familiarizing yourself with it all you need to do is occasionally check on the battery as it needs to be changed every 2 years. I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Friendly Shopper

customer_reviews.title: It looks nice and the light blinks telling me it works
customer_reviews.text: It looks nice and the light blinks telling me it works. But I've never used it and hope I never have to.
customer_reviews.author: Atony

customer_reviews.title: Philips HeartStart Home Defibrillator
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased that I bought the Philips HeatStart Home Defibrillator. This gives me peace of mind. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Curtis Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: i do hope i will never need to use it!
customer_reviews.author: ying he

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Need to order another one now since I gave the swim team mine. After a kid on the swim team was revived with one of these, I had to make sure that the HS swim team had one on hand at all times. Now... I'm thinking I should have one in the car as well.
customer_reviews.author: C. Harris

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, Easy to use product
customer_reviews.text: We hope to never have to use this defibrillator, but if we ever do, it appears to be very straight forward and easy to use. There is an excellent short video that comes with it explaining its use and the product itself seems extremely well made and researched in order to make saving a person's life (not the calmest of experiences) an easy to understand process. It is also lightweight and compact. If we ever have to use it and it is succesful in saving a loved ones life, you can be sure we will be writing another rave review.
customer_reviews.author: pemo

customer_reviews.title: Exactly What I Expected
customer_reviews.text: Simple to use, easy to maintain. Our family has someone that experiences arrhythmia on a regular basis. We live 30 minutes from EMS. No brainer. If they have sudden cardiac failure they are dead without a defibrillator. At about $1200 it is a great investment even if we never use it.
customer_reviews.author: Gregor VII

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use with voice instructions for both the defib ...
customer_reviews.text: Finally got the funds to place some around the school. These will be potential life-savers in the future. Easy to use with voice instructions for both the defib portion and the CPR portion if needed.
customer_reviews.author: D. Wong

customer_reviews.title: How can you argue with safety? No one wants ...
customer_reviews.text: How can you argue with safety? No one wants to think about the possibilities of needing one so they go through life with their head in the sand rather than prepare. This is an idiot proof device - all you need to do is listen to the voice commands and the machine does the rest.
customer_reviews.author: Lola

product_meta.title: Philips HeartStart Home AED Defibrillator with Slim Carry Case
product_meta.description: Style:AEDThe Philips HeartStart Home AED Defibrillator is designed for the ordinary person in the extraordinary moment. This defibrillator guides you through the process of treating a victim of suspected sudden cardiac arrest. The HeartStart Home AED provides real-time guidance through step-by-step voice commands and CPR guidance. The AED also comes equipped with integrated adult AED SMART pads, which provide feedback to the defibrillator so it can adapt its voice instructions to your pace. To give you confidence in your ability, you also can install a special pads cartridge (sold separately) that temporarily turns your HeartStart Home defibrillator into a trainer. This AED comes with a Slim Carry Case, which can accommodate a pair of paramedic scissors in addition to the defibrillator.
feature_bullets: AED defibrillator designed for ease of use and prompt response
Step-by-step voice commands and CPR guidance provide real-time guidance
Easily converts to an AED trainer when you attach training pads (sold separately)
Slim AED Carry Case accommodates defibrillator and paramedic scissors

AED ships with: HeartStart Home AED Defibrillator, pre-installed battery, pre-installed adult SMART pads cartridge, quick setup guide, maintenance booklet, quick reference guide, owner’s manual, Slim Carry Case, and training DVD
